channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Humanoid robots are 'stepping out of the lab and into the real world' to take the jobs we don't want - so get ready for the rise of the robot coworkers
item.description: Humanoid robots are entering real workplaces due to labor shortages, falling costs, and technical progress, though large-scale adoption remains uncertain.

item.title: Free Bitcoin Glitch Fixed When ‘Decentralized’ Crypto Exchange Uses Centralized Rollback
item.description: Situations that expose centralization in supposedly decentralized exchanges have become par for the course in crypto.

item.title: College Football Playoff National Championship 2026 Free Streams: Watch Miami vs Indiana, TV Channels, Preview
item.description: As the Miami Hurricanes and Indiana Hoosiers go for the big one, here's how to watch College Football Playoff National Championship 2026 for free and from anywhere.

item.title: Bungie's Marathon arrives on March 5
item.description: Marathon, Bungie's long-awaited extraction shooter, will arrive on March 5, the studio announced today. Alongside a definitive release date, Bungie shared a new gameplay trailer, in addition to details about the game's forthcoming deluxe edition, which fans can pre-order today on Steam, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S. All versions of the game will support crossplay, meaning you'll be able to play with your friends, no matter where they decide to buy Marathon. Sony, Bungie's parent company, had previously committed to a March release for Marathon, but stopped short of sharing an exact date....

item.title: A second US Sphere could come to Maryland
item.description: Sphere Entertainment, the company behind the eye-catching interactive venue in Las Vegas, has announced its "intent to develop" another Sphere in Maryland that will be located 15 minutes south of Washington, DC. A timeline and exact location haven't been finalized, but the Maryland Sphere would be the company's second venue in the US, following plans […]...

item.title: Entièrement réfléchissant, ce casque vélo propose une visière magnétique : pourquoi c’est une très bonne idée
item.description: En plus d’être le seul casque vélo totalement réfléchissant, et compatible MIPS et speedbike, le Swivvle Sirius 2.0 propose une autre idée originale : une visière magnétique en option.

item.title: Huge data breach reveals info on 750,000 investors - here's what we know, and how to see if you're affected
item.description: CIRO details what happened in 2025 data breach, including what kind of info was taken.

item.title: We Got Anime ‘Among Us’ Before That Stacked Hollywood Cast ‘Among Us’ Cartoon
item.description: 'Gnosia' is basically the pandemic-era online multiplayer game—but with pretty anime waifus, husbandos, an actual alien, and a talking dolphin.

item.title: How to watch Indiana vs. Miami online for free
item.description: How to watch college football for free. Live stream Indiana vs. Miami in 2026 without cable.

item.title: These Chrome extensions spoof Workday, NetSuite, and others to trick victims - here's what to look for
item.description: Five extensions were found targeting enterprises and multinational organizations, taking over valuable accounts.
